name: Hide_Labor_Ges_Columns
action:
<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(LMS_Ad_GES%,LMS_Labor_GES%)*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(LMS_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
